Author: linux-security@amazon.com
Title: Amazon Linux 2 - Python3.8 2.0 - ALAS2PYTHON3.8-2024-015: medium priority package update for python38-pip
Description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2 - Python3.8 that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2024-3651:
	python-idna: potential DoS via resource consumption via specially crafted inputs to idna.encode()
